Travel_History.reason: This value contains a detailed list of the patient's recent travel history, including locations visited, dates of travel, purposes, accommodations, modes of transportation, and activities during each trip.

value.History of Travel Narrative: Patient reports recent travel to Kingston, Jamaica from June 15-22, 2024, where she attended a large family reunion barbecue and ate at local restaurants. This travel occurred approximately 3 weeks prior to onset of symptoms. Patient also reports attending an outdoor birthday party in the Bronx, NY on May 25, 2024, where she consumed food from various sources including homemade dishes. Additionally, patient visited a new local deli in Yonkers, NY on May 10, 2024, where she tried their specialty sandwich. These local food consumption events occurred approximately 6-8 weeks before symptom onset. All reported travel and dining experiences present potential exposure risks for Salmonella infection.
